createEmailRolesAction

public static EscalationAction createEmailRolesAction(long wait,
                                                      boolean sms,
                                                      java.util.List<Role> roles)
Create an EmailAction to notify Roles

Parameters:
wait - The wait time in ms before escalating.
sms - Flag to indicate whether email or sms notification should be used.
roles - The list of Roles to notify.
Returns:
An email EscalationAction

Parameters:

Create an EmailAction to notify emails

Parameters:
wait - The wait time in ms before escalating.

createSyslogAction

public static EscalationAction createSyslogAction(long wait,
                                                  java.lang.String meta,
                                                  java.lang.String product,
                                                  java.lang.String version)
Create a Syslog action

Parameters:
wait - The wait time in ms before escalating.
meta - The meta flag for this action.
product - The product value for this action.
version - The version value for this action.
Returns:
A syslog EscalationAction

createSnmpAction

public static EscalationAction createSnmpAction(long wait,
                                                java.lang.String address,
                                                java.lang.String notificationMechanism,
                                                java.lang.String oid,
                                                java.lang.String variableBindings)
Create a SNMP action

Parameters:
wait - The wait time in ms before escalating.
address - The IP address (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx/port) of the target engine.
notificationMechanism - The notification mechanisim.
oid - The first SNMP variable binding OID. This OID is required and the value is the output from snmp_trap.gsp.
variableBindings - Optional SNMP variable bindings in JSONArray format.
Returns:
A SNMP EscalationAction

Parameters:
wait - The wait time in ms before escalating.
Returns:
A no-op {EscalationAction}
